_comment: Pi Chronicle project settings. Agents read this to understand your project conventions.

project.name: AdventureEngine
project.description: Adventure Engine — a polyglot monorepo with .NET 9 backend and React frontend.

architecture.pattern: Vertical Slice Architecture wrapping Clean Architecture + DDD
architecture.notes: Feature slices in apps/Api/Features/<Name>/. SharedKernel in packages/SharedKernel/. No MediatR. Dependencies: slices → SharedKernel only.

sprint._comment_capacity: Total story points the team can deliver per sprint. Default 8 = ~4 medium items or 8 small items.
sprint._comment_buffer: Reserve this fraction of capacity for interruptions, bugs, and review. 0.2 = 20% buffer.
sprint._comment_scale: Point scale: small=1, medium=2, large=3. Never plan xl (5pt) items — break them down first.

skills._comment_auto: When true, auto-loads skills based on settings above (tdd, testing.framework, git.commitStyle, architecture.pattern)
